mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE M JOIN MOVIE_DIBS D ON M.MOVIE_CODE = D.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT WHERE D.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM MOVIEPOST MP JOIN MOVIE M ON MP.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MOVIEPOST_NUM, COUNT(*) AS moviepost_Like FROM MOVIEPOST_LIKE GROUP BY MOVIEPOST_NUM ) L ON MP.MOVIEPOST_NUM = L.MOVIEPOST_NUM WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT MOVIE.*, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.MOVIE_CODE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE L WHERE L.MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_OBJECT = R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM) AS movie_Review_like_cnt, COUNT(*) OVER () AS review_cnt FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON R.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE where m.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE TS JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE JOIN THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID JOIN THEATER_ROOM TR ON TS.THEATER_ROOM_ID = TR.THEATER_ROOM_ID WHERE TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID IN ( SELECT THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID FROM KAKAO_PAY WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} )
